The Cryptographic Services service failed to initialize the Catalog Database. The error was: %1 : %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="%1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="%2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Cryptographic Services service failed to initialize the Catalog Database. The ESENT error was: %1.

Event.Task: Add a Security Catalog to the Catalog Database
Event.Message: The catalog file %2 is being added to subsystem %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Subsystem" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Add a Security Catalog to the Catalog Database
Event.Message: Addition of the catalog file completed. Status %1.

Event.Task: Remove a Security Catalog from the Catalog Database
Event.Message: The catalog file %2 is being removed from the subsystem %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Subsystem" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Remove a Security Catalog from the Catalog Database
Event.Message: Removal of the catalog file completed. Status %1.

Event.Task: Sync a Security Catalog with the Catalog Database
Event.Message: The catalog file %2 is being synced to the subsystem %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Subsystem" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Sync a Security Catalog with the Catalog Database
Event.Message: Sync of the catalog file completed. Status %1.

Event.Task: Rebuild a subsystem of the Catalog Database
Event.Message: The Catalog Database is being rebuilt for subsystem %1.

Event.Task: Rebuild a subsystem of the Catalog Database
Event.Message: Rebuild of the Catalog Database for the chosen subsystem has completed. Status %1.

Event.Task: Search for Security Catalogs in the Catalog Database that contain the hash
Event.Message: A hash of type %2, length %3 and value %4 is being searched for in subsystem %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Subsystem" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Algorithm" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Length" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="Length"/> </template>

Event.Task: Search for Security Catalogs in the Catalog Database that contain the hash
Event.Message: The hash search completed and was found in %2 catalogs. Status %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Task: Sync a Security Catalog with the Catalog Database
Event.Message: Sync of subsystem %1 has started.

Event.Task: Sync a Security Catalog with the Catalog Database
Event.Message: Sync of the subsystem completed. Status %1.
